title: How 5G could unlock the world of AI
text:
How 5G could unlock the world of AI 10:32am GMT - 01:39 
Artificial intelligence powered by super fast 5G wireless networks is the talk of the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona though, as Reuters' Doug Busvine reports, whether or not you'll be seeing this tech soon depends on where you live. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Artificial intelligence powered by super fast 5G wireless networks is the talk of the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona though, as Reuters' Doug Busvine reports, whether or not you'll be seeing this tech soon depends on where you live.
